name: Pauline Dauvin
background: Pauline Dauvin serves as VP, Programming, Production and Acquisitions at Disney+ France. Focus areas: Overall content strategy for French originals. They are looking for: Premium factual with family-friendly appeal and strong production values. Overall network strategy: Disney+ France seeks premium factual content with family-friendly appeal and strong production values, focusing on inspirational storytelling, cultural relevance and universal themes that align with Disney's brand values.
thematic_priorities: Premium factual content with family-friendly appeal
Sports documentaries featuring inspirational athletes or teams
Nature and wildlife programming with family appeal
target_audience: French audiences with global reach potential
format_specifications: Both series and one-off depending on story and slot
Primetime/flagship slots; platform premieres for streamers
Open to international co-productions where aligned
3–10 episodes for series depending on strand
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: Must come via established production company or agent
Detailed treatment with premise, format and episode breakdown
Key talent and production team credentials
Submit via Disney's established production partners
additional_info: Ongoing commissioning cycles; submissions accepted year-round unless strand-specific. Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach. Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen. Encouragement of sustainable production practices. Support for projects across French regions.
